Sns.Subject: ALARM: "EC2 instance CPU utilization" in EU - Ireland
Sns.Message: {"AlarmName":"EC2 instance CPU utilization","AlarmDescription":"Raise alarm if CPU > 80% for 60s","AWSAccountId":"759152324809","NewStateValue":"ALARM","NewStateReason":"Threshold Crossed: 1 datapoint [0.0 (23/08/17 17:46:00)] was less than the threshold (80.0).","StateChangeTime":"2017-08-23T17:47:56.428+0000","Region":"EU - Ireland","OldStateValue":"OK","Trigger":{"MetricName":"CPUUtilization","Namespace":"AWS/EC2","StatisticType":"Statistic","Statistic":"AVERAGE","Unit":null,"Dimensions":[{"name":"InstanceId","value":"i-0bf266742c7eae31c"}],"Period":60,"EvaluationPeriods":1,"ComparisonOperator":"LessThanThreshold","Threshold":80.0,"TreatMissingData":"","EvaluateLowSampleCountPercentile":""}}
